1.0.name: wordpress/wp-creativix
1.0.description: Elegant, clean and modern Business & Portfolio Theme which offers a mighty Options Set to customize WP-Creativix to your own needs. It has custom Blog, Portfolio and No-Sidebar Templates blowing your customers mind. Furthermore WP-Creativix lets you choose a Highlight and a Background-Color. Upload your own Logo and Socialize WP-Creativix with Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn. A Multi-Level-Dropdown Menu and a flexible Slider featuring Posts, Pages and Portfolio will turn your WP Installation into an eye-catching Business & Portfolio Website. Please see the DEMO for further Details.
